## ThirdwebSDK.getVote() method

Get an instance of a Vote contract

**Signature:**

```typescript
getVote(address: string): Vote;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type   | Description                          |
| --------- | ------ | ------------------------------------ |
| address   | string | the address of the deployed contract |

**Returns:**

Vote

the contract
